item.description: Goal airflow 완강 airflow 책 완독 airflow project 수행 Files1TABLE 2alias AS "Description" , dateformat(updated,"yyyy-MM-dd") as updated 3from #ariflow 4SORT file.path ASCENDING Last Update1const cfile = dv.current().file; 2const list = dv.pages(`"${cfile.folder}"`) 3 .filter(b => b.file.name != cfile.name) 4 .sort(b => b.file.cday) 5 .map(b => b.file.link); 6dv.list(list); Todo1list from #ariflow 2where contains(status,"todo") 3SORT file.path ASCENDING In Progress1list from #ariflow 2where contains(status,"in_progress") 3SORT file.path ASCENDING Done1list from #ariflow 2where contains(status,"done") 3SORT file.
